verbose_text: Lajter [XREF_BIBR] investigated the anti-inflammatory activity of lignans, flavonoids, and sesquiterpene lactones from the aerial part and roots of O. acanthium on different targets such as activity on the expression of cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2) and nuclear factor kappa-light-chain-enhancer of activated B cells (NF-kappaB1), and its inhibitory effect on the production of NO, 5-lipoxygenase (5-LOX,) COX-1, and COX-2.
